title: Triangle Bookend
original_name: トライアングル・ブックエンド
sinopse:
Naoki has a bad habit of seducing other people's lovers, and after a fight with his friend, he was sent to his uncle for the entire summer holiday as a punishment. There he meets Kei, the gloomy assistant of his uncle. But soon after arriving, Naoki discovers that Kei is not exactly just a live-in assistant...

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
